title: Chapter 1
description: This is the description for Chapter 1.
content:
Joy is too simple of a concept, 
too complex of a feeling. 
I find this exact concoction of emotions, 
across the ocean blue and orange hues. 
I am sad. But hopeful. 
For in the morning, you will make me full
of joy once more.
